body_content.explanation:
abbreviation for 
starting price : the amount of money offered just at the start of a race by a bookmaker for a winning bet (= money risked):
examples: Under the new system, prices will be sent straight from bookmakers' computers to machinery which will calculate the SP at the "off".

body_content.explanation: information about a person or situation:
examples: Meet him outside the post office at midday. Give him the SP on the situation.
We buy undercover from 10 vendors and give you the full SP on their sales, delivery, build quality and support.
